room_title: Escape room "Murder Motel" by Hour Glass Escape Games in Bowling Green
room_address: 1043 Pedigo Way Suite 13, Bowling Green, KY 42103
room_description: The Hour Glass Inn is home to one of the most mind boggling cases of all time. Many times guests have reported feeling as if they were being watched by the disturbingly uninviting bellhop. In many instances, the guests have turned up missing, never to be heard from again. Break into the Hour Glass Inn while the bellhop is roaming around the hotel and try to discover the unknown truth behind the eerie occurrences of the Hour Glass Inn. But hurry. The bellhop moves in silence and could return at any moment.
